summary: This is a grand jury subpoena for Jeffrey Epstein trust documents, served on the law firm Kellerhals, Ferguson, Kroblin on June 2, 2020, with a return received via email on June 25, 2020. It is part of the federal investigation into Epstein's financial affairs.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The grand jury subpoena is for documents related to his trust, indicating ongoing financial investigation after his death.

events.title: Subpoena served on law firm
events.description: Grand jury subpoena for Jeffrey Epstein trust documents served on the law firm Kellerhals, Ferguson, Kroblin.

events.title: Subpoena return received
events.description: Return for the grand jury subpoena received via email.

keyFacts: A federal grand jury subpoena was issued for Jeffrey Epstein trust documents in 2020, indicating ongoing investigation into his financial affairs after his death.
The subpoena was served on the law firm Kellerhals, Ferguson, Kroblin on June 2, 2020.
The return for the subpoena was received via email on June 25, 2020.
The document is part of Case ID 196D-SJ-3262541-GJ, showing active federal grand jury proceedings.
The document highlights the use of legal channels to obtain financial records from Epstein's estate.
